Cara and I have been married for over
six years and almost every morning since
then I've brought her coffee in bed this
isn't something I'm saying to to pat
myself on the back there is a point to
this so at some point early in our
marriage
I've brought Cara a cup of coffee in bed
one day and I realized how happy it made
her and then seeing her happy made me
happy so I continued to do it and then
it just kind of became a habit it's
something that I try to do every morning
now and also something that we've
included in our videos over the last
four years without really thinking much
about it however lately people have
started tagging us on Instagram when
they've been bringing their partner
coffee in bed and then we had the party
in Nashville a few weeks ago and I
talked to a few people who told me that
they were grateful that I did that for
Cara because now their spouse did that
for them and it was part of their
routine and and that just made me really
happy it seems like a pretty
insignificant thing but the more that
I've thought about it over the last
couple years it's something that I'm
really intentional about continuing to
do because I've realized that if nothing
else it guarantees that I do one
thoughtful thing for carat ever
single day I am far from perfect and I'm
sure there are plenty of days where I
wake up and then I just get engulfed in
this like selfish stressful all the
things that I have going on and and on
those days I might not be the best
husband but the good thing about doing
this first thing in the morning is that
it's before the day gets too crazy and
it's it's just one way that I can
guarantee that I'd do something nice for
Cara so on this Valentine's Day I want
to challenge you to bring your partner
coffee or whatever their drink of choice
is in bed for the rest of the month or
you can just do it for one day because
one day is better than no days and I
realized I didn't invent bringing your
partner coffee in bed but I do think
it's one of the best things that I do
for Karen Ives relationship and so if I
can spread that to some other people's
relationships that's what I'm trying to
do in this video and if for some reason
your circumstances don't allow you to
bring your partner coffee in bed I would
challenge you to think through how you
can add one thoughtful thing into your
daily routine okay that's it there's no
prize for completing the challenge I
just wanted to spread the idea of doing
one thoughtful thing for your loved one
every single day
